Monthly Crop

19.11.2017

A DASH TO ITALY

WE ARE LOOKING FOR A NEW BRAND AMBASSADOR
Are you super friendly, based in London and keen to join a team challenging the soft drinks industry? We’re looking for proactive individuals to represent the Dash mission to naturally hydrate the nation in a fun sustainable way.
You’ll be spreading our mission & introducing our drinks to new consumers. Who is Dash and what do you stand for? With current fridge space full of sugar and artificially filled drinks Dash is shaking up the norm.

Dash is British sparkling spring water infused with wonky fruit & veg (the ones which are rejected by the supermarkets because they’re misshapen) for a natural
dash of flavour with no sugar, calories or sweetener. Our mission is to naturally hydrate the nation and reduce food waste in a fun, sustainable way.

Sounds good, what next? We’d love you to get in touch, drop an email to hello@dash-water.com with your CV and we’ll get right back to you. In the mean time, check out our journey so far on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook @dashdrink
A dash of detail
- THE ROLE: Dash Brand Ambassador
- WHERE: Dash Brand Ambassador
- MONEY: Dash Brand Ambassador
- TIME: Dash Brand Ambassador
- WHAT EXACTLY IS A DASH BRAND AMBASSADOR?
Ambassador’s are part time team members to join events in London and represent in-store samplings including Selfridges, Planet Organic and Daylesford.

19.11.2017

SPOTTED

The Chill Method

We have earned hipster creds with our feature in The Chill Method working in the mainstream soft drinks industry where we developed a daily ritual of concocting our own infused waters.

We have earned hipster creds with our feature in The Chill Method. working in the mainstream soft drinks industry where we developed a daily ritual of concocting our own infused waters. We wanted to create drinks in the same way as our infusions which could not yet be found on the market.

And so Dash was born...
